title: PR Manager, Latin America & US Hispanic
summary: Apple's communications team informs the world about our innovative products and services. Seeking a Public Relations Manager for Latin America & US Hispanic markets.
description: The successful candidate will bring energy, ideas, and fresh storytelling ideas to fruition. Collaborate with various teams to build and deliver PR programs, deepen media relationships, and lead strategic communication efforts.
preferred_qualifications: A demonstrated track record in delivering impactful PR campaigns, university degree in relevant fields, self-motivated and team player, skilled in communication and problem-solving, proficiency in Portuguese.
